Free World for All.
thank you very much! very informational! thumbs up!

Hi! I am quite a noob at this so Iprobably will have done something wrong. I downloaded the whole thing and for some reason all I get is the audio (no video at all). All maps that have been downloaded contain .avi files so normally that should contain imagery, right? What in the world am I doing wrong?:s Thanks in advance!

Update: I do get video when I play the files in Miro itself. But when I open them from my desktop itself in Windows Media Player all I get is audio. Could it be that my WMP does not support it and I should get another player?

I've never had or even heard about problems like that, sorry.
I'm using KMPlayer and I have NEVER had ANY problems with video/audio or missing codecs. I strongly recommend U KMPlayer. U will never have to post this kind of comment again with it :)
This collection is not so good.Cheers
